page.title: 04EVENTS IN GODMERSHAM
page.content: In a small village many of the events are fund raising, the church and village hall are always in need of money.The church recently benefited from a two day event associated with Jane Austen,a frequent visitor to Godmersham. A flower festival was held in the newly decorated church.Annual events include the Gardeners Produce show, a carol concert in the village hall and a pre Xmas bazaar with all local organisations taking part. The Gardeners have an annual supper and there is a harvest festival. The church takes part in a Five Church Sponsored Walk with four other local churches. Various local people throw open their gardens or hold functions to raise money. Every-one manages to enjoy themselves at the same time.
